recipes.label: Enforce my Designs
recipes.startdescription: There is someone or something between me and my desires. Time to show them my superiority. I could approach this with the force of Forge or the strength of Edge.
recipes.description: There is someone or something between me and my desires. Time to show them my superiority. I could approach this with the force of Forge or the strength of Edge.

slots.description: Which implements are available for my approach.

recipes.label: A Desire For Dominion
recipes.startdescription: I will rise to the challenge, like the Spider rises towards the Glory. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: A Desire For Victory
recipes.startdescription: I will surpass the challenge. In my blood lie the roots of victory. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: A Desire For Struggle
recipes.startdescription: I will match my skill to the challenge. We may yet succed.

recipes.label: Stronger than Steel
recipes.startdescription: I've grown strong. Like the Lionsmith, I'll grow stronger still. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Stronger than Iron
recipes.startdescription: I grow stronger. I'll display my ingenuity against men or nature. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Stronger than Brass
recipes.startdescription: I grow stronger. Only through testing my limits, can I discover how to surpass them. We may yet succed.
